==Steps==
#Go to the entrance of [[Stormterror's Lair]]
#Defeat the assailants {{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl*1;Anemo Samachurl*1;Hilichurl Grenadier*1}}
#Disperse the wind barrier

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|You came to Stormterror's Lair to once again attempt [[Dvalin]]'s rescue. However, it is surrounded by wind barriers made by Stormterror, and the dark forces at work have no intention of letting you break through those barriers so easily.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Outside the barrier of the Stormterror's Lair)
:{{A|vo mdaq065 2 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It's a storm {{Color|buzzword|barrier}}!
:{{A|vo mdaq065 2 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It looks so dangerous...
:{{A|vo mdaq065 2 venti 01.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Let me at it.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 2 venti 02.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Although this wooden lyre is all I have...
:{{A|vo mdaq065 2 venti 03.ogg}} '''Venti:''' I don't need the lyre to break through this kind of storm barri&mdash; Ah, wait, what is that?
:;(A group of hilichurls appears)
:{{A|vo mdaq065 2 qin 01.ogg}} '''Jean:''' Enemy attack! Prepare yourselves!
:{{A|vo mdaq065 3 venti 01.ogg}} '''Venti:''' The stage will need to be cleared before I can begin my performance.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 3 venti 02.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Generally speaking such chores are not the concerns of the performer himself...
:{{A|vo mdaq065 3 qin 01.ogg}} '''Jean:''' Wait. What's going on? Something's not right.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 3 qin 02.ogg}} '''Jean:''' There shouldn't be any hilichurl camps in the vicinity of {{Color|buzzword|Stormterror's Lair}}...

:;(After defeating the hilichurls)
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 venti 01.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Ahh...
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 venti 02.ogg}} '''Venti:''' The hilichurls usually do not venture into areas with high elemental concentrations.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 venti 03.ogg}} '''Venti:''' It puts a heavy burden on their bodies.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 diluc 01.ogg}} '''Diluc:''' The [[Abyss Order]] must be manipulating them behind the scenes, yet they shouldn't have been able to determine that we would come.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 diluc 02.ogg}} '''Diluc:''' They're presumably spreading their forces to halt our plans.
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 venti 04.ogg}} '''Venti:''' Without further ado...
:{{A|vo mdaq065 4 venti 05.ogg}} '''Venti:''' I suppose I can play faster if my only audience is the wind.
:;(Venti disperses the wind barrier by playing the lyre)
:{{A|vo mdaq066 5 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It actually opened! You're not entirely useless, Tone-Deaf Bard!
:{{A|vo mdaq066 5 qin 01.ogg}} '''Jean:''' This is it. We are now entering {{Color|buzzword|Stormterror's Lair}}.
:{{A|vo mdaq066 5 qin 02.ogg}} '''Jean:''' Watch yourselves. Let's move.
{{Dialogue end}}
